nodes.bodyText: @Sara4994  This condition could be replaced by (rememberedParams.length === 0 && parameters.length !== 1)  || (rememberedParams.length > 0) to avoid the "else if" executing the same code ?
@Sara4994 it looks good and works fine, just left this minor comment..

This file contains bidirectional Unicode text that may be interpreted or compiled differently than what appears below. To review, open the file in an editor that reveals hidden Unicode characters. Learn more about bidirectional Unicode characters


  


    
      
        Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
                        fetchPolicy: enableCache ? undefined : 'network-only'
          
          
            
                        fetchPolicy: enableCache ? 'cache-first' : 'network-only'
          
      
    
    
  

'cache-first' is the default anyway, just to make the code clear.
do we also need to pass the state function here? Wouldnt that make on component dependend on the other?

@cristianonicolai  i would say yes, right now it is dependent. i am passing this function here because i have set enableCache as false when "apply columns" button is clicked, so that the query fetched data from network.
sure, but does the parent component needs to be notified/changed because of that? I was wondering if this would be the internal state of the child component.

@cristianonicolai yep, the function is used to set enableCache as true here in parent component, 
  
    
      kogito-apps/packages/management-console/src/components/Templates/DomainExplorerDashboard/DomainExplorerDashboard.tsx
    
    
         Line 136
      in
      1acc922
    
    
    
    

        
          
           setEnableCache(true); 
        
    
  


it would be set as true when moving process details -> Domain list so that the query will run with cache, but then when we click on "apply columns" it should trigger query freshly without cache so i am setting at as false in the child component using same function "setEnableCache"
